00080 static void signalHandler(int signalNumber) {
00081   gInterruptRequested = 1;
00082 }
00083 //=============================================================================
00084 static bool printUsage(std::string nodeName, int argc, char** argv) {
00085   //Check for "-h" or "--help", if found, print usage
00086   for (int i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00087     if ((0 == strcmp(argv[i], "-h")) || (0 == strcmp(argv[i], "--help"))) {
00088       printf("\n");
00089       printf("Usage:\n");
00090       printf("    %s [params]\n", nodeName.c_str());
00091       printf("\n");
00092       printf("Parameters and their default values\n");
00093       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00094              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_TELEOP_TOPIC,
00095              (nodeName + "/" + teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_TELEOP_TOPIC).c_str());
00096       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00097              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_TWIST_TOPIC,
00098              (nodeName + "/" + teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_TWIST_TOPIC).c_str());
00099       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00100              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_X,
00101              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_X ? "true" : "false");
00102       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00103              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_Y,
00104              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_Y ? "true" : "false");
00105       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00106              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_HAS_LIN_Z,
00107              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_LIN_Z ? "true" : "false");
00108       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00109              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_X,
00110              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_X ? "true" : "false");
00111       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00112              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_Y,
00113              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_Y ? "true" : "false");
00114       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00115              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_HAS_ROT_Z,
00116              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_HAS_ROT_Z ? "true" : "false");
00117       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00118              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_X,
00119              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_X);
00120       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00121              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_Y,
00122              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Y);
00123       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00124              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MIN_LIN_Z,
00125              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_LIN_Z);
00126       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00127              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_X,
00128              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_X);
00129       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00130              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_Y,
00131              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Y);
00132       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00133              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MIN_ROT_Z,
00134              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MIN_ROT_Z);
00135       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00136              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_X,
00137              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_X);
00138       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00139              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_Y,
00140              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Y);
00141       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00142              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MAX_LIN_Z,
00143              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_LIN_Z);
00144       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00145              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_X,
00146              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_MAX_ROT_X);
00147       printf("    _%s:=%lf\n",
00148              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_MAX_ROT_Y,

00154              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_X,

00156       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00157              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_Y,
00158              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_Y ? "true" : "false");
00159       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00160              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_LIN_Z,
00161              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_LIN_Z ? "true" : "false");
00162       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00163              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_X,
00164              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_X ? "true" : "false");
00165       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00166              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_Y,
00167              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_Y ? "true" : "false");
00168       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00169              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_QUADRATIC_ROT_Z,
00170              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_QUADRATIC_ROT_Z ? "true" : "false");
00171       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00172              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_X,
00173              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_X ? "true" : "false");
00174       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00175              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_Y,
00176              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_Y ? "true" : "false");
00177       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00178              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_LIN_Z,
00179              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_LIN_Z ? "true" : "false");
00180       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00181              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_X,
00182              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_X ? "true" : "false");
00183       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00184              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_Y,
00185              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_Y ? "true" : "false");
00186       printf("    _%s:=%s\n",
00187              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_KEY_THROTTLE_ROT_Z,
00188              teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode::PARAM_DEFAULT_THROTTLE_ROT_Z ? "true" : "false");
00189       printf("\n");
00190       return true;
00191     }
00192   }
00193   return false;
00194 }

00200 //=============================================================================
00201 //Main
00202 //=============================================================================
00203 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00204   //Use first argument (executable name) as node name
00205   std::string nodeName(basename(argv[0]));
00206 
00207   //Check if we should just print usage information and quit
00208   if (printUsage(nodeName, argc, argv)) {
00209     return 0;
00210   }
00211 
00212   //Set SIGINT signal handler
00213   signal(SIGINT, signalHandler);
00214 
00215   //Create the node object
00216   teleop::TeleopSinkTwistNode node;
00217 
00218   //Init node object
00219   if (!node.init(argc, argv, nodeName, ros::init_options::NoSigintHandler)) {
00220     ROS_ERROR("main: error initialising node");
00221     return 1;
00222   }
00223 
00224   //Periodically check for interruption
00225   while (0 == gInterruptRequested) {
00226     boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(500));
00227   }
00228 
00229   //Done
00230   return 0;
00231 }
